text: Why didn't I substitute it the other way around? Why didn't I say this? Why didn't I say that this <EXPRESSION> is <EXPRESSION>, and why didn't I say this <EXPRESSION> is <EXPRESSION>? Well, as you can see, this would have been useless, right? Because then I can't multiply it times a <EXPRESSION>, and it gets all confusing.
